statements: SELECT rental_id, rental_start_date, return_date, total_cost, rental_duration FROM rental_transactions;
SELECT * FROM rental_transactions WHERE total_cost > 100;
SELECT rental_id, total_cost FROM rental_transactions WHERE rental_start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT rental_duration, total_cost FROM rental_transactions ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT rental_id, total_cost FROM rental_transactions WHERE total_cost < 50 ORDER BY rental_start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM rental_transactions ORDER BY rental_start_date DESC, total_cost ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT rental_id, total_cost FROM rental_transactions WHERE rental_duration > INTERVAL '7 days'
SELECT COUNT(rental_id) AS total_rentals, SUM(total_cost) AS total_revenue FROM rental_transactions WHERE return_date IS NOT NULL
SELECT rental_id, rental_start_date, return_date FROM rental_transactions WHERE rental_duration BETWEEN INTERVAL '3 days' AND INTERVAL '7 days'
SELECT AVG(total_cost) AS average_cost, MAX(total_cost) AS max_cost, MIN(total_cost) AS min_cost FROM rental_transactions
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE total_cost > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, rental_start_date, return_date FROM transaction WHERE rental_duration > 7;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM transaction ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customer ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE transaction_id = 1
SELECT transaction_id, total_cost FROM transaction WHERE rental_duration > 5
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customer WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM transaction JOIN customer ON transaction.transaction_id = customer.customer_id
SELECT * FROM rental_transactions WHERE total_cost > 1000;
SELECT rental_id, rental_start_date, rental_duration FROM rental_transactions ORDER BY rental_start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT object_name, object_type FROM rental_objects WHERE object_type = 'Car';
SELECT * FROM rental_transactions WHERE return_date IS NULL;
SELECT rental_id, rental_start_date, return_date FROM rental_transactions WHERE rental_duration > '30 days';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT object_name, object_type, object_description FROM rental_objects WHERE object_type = 'Car' ORDER BY object_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
SELECT rental_id, rental_duration, total_cost FROM rental_transactions WHERE total_cost >= 1000 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM rental_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, rental_start_date, return_date FROM rental_transactions;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, rental_price FROM rental_items WHERE rental_price > 50;

SELECT t.transaction_id, c.customer_name, i.item_name FROM rental_details rd JOIN rental_transactions t ON rd.transaction_id = t.transaction_id JOIN customers c ON rd.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN rental_items i ON rd.item_id = i.item_id;
SELECT * FROM rental_transactions;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, rental_price FROM rental_items WHERE rental_price > 50;
SELECT transaction_id, rental_start_date, total_cost FROM rental_transactions WHERE total_cost < 100;
SELECT customer_id, item_name, rental_price FROM customers c INNER JOIN rental_details rd ON c.customer_id = rd.customer_id INNER JOIN rental_items ri ON rd.item_id = ri.item_id;
SELECT * FROM rental_transactions;
SELECT total_cost, rental_start_date FROM rental_transactions WHERE total_cost > 100;
SELECT rental_duration, return_date FROM rental_transactions WHERE return_date IS NULL;
SELECT item_name, rental_price FROM rental_items ORDER BY rental_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM rental_transactions ORDER BY rental_start_date DESC, total_cost ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, rental_start_date, total_cost FROM customers c JOIN rental_transactions rt ON c.customer_id = rt.transaction_id;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM rental_locations WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM rental_history WHERE rental_id = 1);
SELECT item_name, SUM(rental_price) AS total_rental_cost FROM rental_items ri JOIN rental_history rh ON ri.item_id = rh.item_id GROUP BY item_name;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, rental_start_date, return_date FROM customers c JOIN rental_transactions rt ON c.customer_id = rt.transaction_id WHERE rental_duration > '7 days';
